but yeah we had random objects throughout the game that were randomly unaffected by image_xscale

the solution is the dumbest thing ever
the cause was an old COMMENT from an unused save script that was //global.image_xscale = 1 that the compiler did unholy things with
deleting the COMMENT fixed it
